- **Gene Name:** topoisomerase 6 subunit  B, BRASSINOSTEROID INSENSITIVE 3, HARLEQUIN, ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 6, ROOT HAIRLESS 3, topoisomerase 6 subunit  B

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS68702]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Dwarf, skotomorphogenic (green cotyledons and short hypocotyls in the dark), and sterile.  Expresses proDc3:GUS reporter in a checkered pattern in epidermis of roots and hypocotyls, accumulates callose and starch, has deformed and collapsed epidermal cells, and abnormal and reduced root hairs and leaf trichomes.
   - [CS68703]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Dwarf, skotomorphogenic (green cotyledons and short hypocotyls in the dark), and sterile.  Expresses proDc3:GUS reporter in a checkered pattern in epidermis of roots and hypocotyls, accumulates callose and starch, has deformed and collapsed epidermal cells, and abnormal and reduced root hairs and leaf trichomes.
   - [CS68704]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Dwarf, skotomorphogenic (green cotyledons and short hypocotyls in the dark), and sterile.  Expresses proDc3:GUS reporter in a checkered pattern in epidermis of roots and hypocotyls, accumulates callose and starch, has deformed and collapsed epidermal cells, and abnormal and reduced root hairs and leaf trichomes.
   - [CS68705]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;hlq-2 homozygous mutants are dwarfed, skotomorphogenic (green cotyledons and short hypocotyls in the dark), and sterile, and accumulate anthocyanins in shoot meristems.
   - [CS68706]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;hlq-3 homozygous mutants are dwarfed, skotomorphogenic (green cotyledons and short hypocotyls in the dark), and sterile, and accumulate anthocyanins in shoot meristems.
   - [bin3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedling lethal.
   - [rhl3-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Complete absence of root hairs, abnormal patterning of leaf epidermis, and dwarfism.
